EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech.com: Newly Designed Website
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> TriTech.com - Newly Designed Website August 20, 2012
TriTech Software Systems is excited to announce the launch of their newly designed website <http://www.tritech.com/>, which goes live today and is located at the same tritech.com address. You'll find a fresh, crisp design with simplified navigation and TriTech's complete product offerings, now aligned under four new product suites:
- Inform: Enterprise Public Safety 911 Call-Taking, CAD, RMS, Mobile, and Intelligence applications (formerly VisiNet, Vision, and 911-Inc. brand names) for PSAPs, Law Enforcement and Fire Protection agencies, and entire city and community public safety systems.
- Perform: Quick deployment Public Safety solutions (formerly IMC brand names) providing high value and scalable integrated applications for CAD, RMS, Mobile and back office to field functions for law and fire.
- Respond: EMS CAD, ePCR and Billing (formerly Sweet and Fusion brand names) – equipping providers with valuable tools to ensure regulatory compliancy, maximize profitability and improve patient care.
- TriTech.com: TriTech’s web-based applications; with more than 8 years of offering applications via the internet and over 100 customers attesting to the proven performance and online benefits, look for more TriTech.com solutions coming soon!
You'll find solutions that you know well, in addition to new products that we are introducing to the market, as well as showcasing for our clients at TriCON <http://www.tritech.com/News-and-Events/One-Company-One-Conference-One-Amazing-Experience>. The new products have been developed from the combined strengths of the former brands, with a focus on enhanced workflow and real-time connectivity - providing you with innovative, integrated solutions to advance your operation.
We began sharing information on these changes in early May <http://offers.tritech.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRow5%2FmYJoDpwmWGd5mht7VzDtPj1OY6hBsoIb%2BJK1TtuMFUGpsqOOaMFQsGBoNvwQ%3D%3D> and in the last newsletter <http://offers.tritech.com/TriTechNews_Q2_2012_NC_Products.html>, and are excited to take the next step in offering the best products and services to our customers.
Remember, in addition to the new website, there’s always three easy ways to get the information you need:
- Telephone: 858-799-7900 - Email:CH_ClientServicesTriage@tritech.com - Support Portal: https://na6.salesforce.com/secur/login_portal.jsp?orgId=00D80000000arem&portalId=06080000000QwMW <https://na6.salesforce.com/secur/login_portal.jsp?orgId=00D80000000arem&portalId=06080000000QwMW>
Log onto the TriTech website <http://www.tritech.com/> now. We hope you enjoy the new website and find it both informative as well as a place to start when you need to reach support or need assistance with evolving your agency.
